comments.creator: reuben.morais@gmail.com
comments.author: reuben.morais@gmail.com
comments.text:
On my MacBook Pro, I have “Tap to click” activated on Trackpad preferences.
Clicking buttons using this soft touch does not trigger any visual feedback that the button has been activated, even though it is.
comments.raw_text:
On my MacBook Pro, I have “Tap to click” activated on Trackpad preferences.
Clicking buttons using this soft touch does not trigger any visual feedback that the button has been activated, even though it is.
